description: Looking for a warming Soup packed full of  Green Veggies, then give this a try. And these Veggies are so budget friendly at the moment too.
name: Creamy Broccoli Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g broccoli, small florets & the stems, diced small
0.5 cup cream (extra for serving, if desired)

recipeInstructions.text: Add broccoli stems, potato and stock, bring up to the boil, then simmer for about 20 minutes or until these veggies are tender.
Add broccoli florets, cauliflower and peas, bring back to the boil, then simmer for about 10 minutes or until these veggies are cooked. Add parsley and remove from heat.
With a stick blender, carefully blend soup until smooth.

Ladle into serving bowls, top with extra cream and pepper if desired. This step is optional. I also like to serve avocado fingers on the side. For 2 serves: Toast 2 slices sourdough bread. Cool to room temp. No butter. Top with avocado, salt and pepper. Cut into fingers and serve on the side.
Gather all ingredients together. Heat a large pot on medium and add the oil.
Add onion and cook for about 4 minutes, or until soft, stirring occasionally. Add garlic and cook for a further 1 minute.
Add cream, season with salt and pepper, and stir to combine.
